about_the_game:
Skyveil is a land of untold riches and lurking dangers. In this MOBA extraction RPG, venture into PvPvE expeditions in squads of up to three. Face rival Seekers, powerful Aurastorm creatures, and dynamic battlegrounds. Choose a hero from a growing roster of unique personalities and gameplay styles. Prep your gear, embark, and decide—extract early or push deeper for even greater rewards?

  • MOBA-Inspired Combat – Master skill-based, top-down battles with unique hero abilities and thrilling team fights.

  • Risk vs. Reward – Extract safely or gamble it all—every match is a high-stakes decision.

  • Flexible Teamplay – Team up with friends or use Party Finder to find like-minded allies. Optimize your strategy in a full three player squad, or test your skill and versatility as a solo or duo team.

  • Dynamic Encounters – Stealth through dangerous areas using tall brush and line of sight. Plan an attack at defensible locations or extraction points. Or engage head-on in thrilling brawls with enemy teams.

Will you escape with fortune or fall to the dangers of Skyveil?

Select from an ever-expanding roster of powerful Seekers. Master unique abilities and playstyles to outmaneuver enemies and claim what’s yours. Assemble your squad and experiment with hundreds of team compositions to optimize your strategy—whether you're farming, hunting, or just trying to survive.

Skyveil is unpredictable—every expedition is a gamble. Sneak past rival teams or choose to engage in a direct attack. Battle powerful creatures and adapt to shifting dangers across three distinct maps. With randomized areas, events, and ever-changing threats, no two runs are the same. Extract early and play it safe, or push deeper into the Heart of the Forest for greater rewards at greater risk. The longer you stay, the deadlier it gets.

Every expedition brings you closer to true mastery—but in Skyveil, power is never permanent. Gather rare materials and craft powerful items to venture deeper. Unlock access to higher-tier maps, where only the strongest Seekers survive. The higher you climb and the more power you gain, the deadlier the opposition will become.

Powerful foes and rival teams stand between you and Skyveil’s greatest treasures. Risk everything for power, but remember— the legendary loot you find can be swept away in the chaos of the storm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon RX 570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: MOBA + EXTRACTION. Team-based PvPvE with top-down combat, where players battle for powerful loot against rivals. Gear up, make a plan, and set a course for Skyveil. Stealthy treasure runs explode into multi-team PvP chaos in an instant. Extract with your riches—or lose it all.
